Package jminusminus

Class CLOutputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.OutputStream
      • java.io.FilterOutputStream
        • java.io.DataOutputStream
          • jminusminus.CLOutputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.io.DataOutput, java.io.Flushable, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    class CLOutputStream
extends java.io.DataOutputStream
    Inherits from java.out.DataOutputStream and provides an extra function for writing unsigned int to the output stream, which is required for writing Java class files.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class java.io.DataOutputStream

        written

      • Fields inherited from class java.io.FilterOutputStream

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void writeInt​(long v)
      Write four bytes to the output stream to represent the value of the argument.

    • Constructor Detail

        public CLOutputStream​(java.io.OutputStream out)

    • Method Detail

      • writeInt

        public final void writeInt​(long v)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Write four bytes to the output stream to represent the value of the argument. The byte values to be written, in the order shown, are: 
             (byte) ( 0xFF & ( v >> 24 ) )
     (byte) ( 0xFF & ( v >> 16 ) )
     (byte) ( 0xFF & ( v >> 8 ) )
     (byte) ( 0xFF & v )
        Parameters:
        v - the int value to be written.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurs while writing.
